name: docker-php-startpage
description: Docker PHP Startpage is a customizable, self-hosted landing page for personal servers or homelabs. It allows organizing links, server info, and widgets with minimal setup and can serve as a simple dashboard.
features: Customizable Landing Page: Create your personal server homepage. Organized access point.
Link Organization: Group and categorize your services. Easy navigation.
Server Info Display: Show system stats and information. At-a-glance monitoring.
Widget Support: Add custom widgets and information blocks. Flexible dashboard.
Minimal Setup: Quick deployment with Docker. Start in minutes.
Self-Hosted: Your personal homepage on your server. Complete customization freedom.
